title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
description: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' functionality does not always work as expected. When attempting to close all editors, including a newly created file f1.txt, by selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
OB: Close All Saved functionality does not work when selecting it from the file menu
EB: The 'Close All Saved' functionality should close all open editors, including the newly created file f1.txt, as no changes have been made to any files.
SR:
1. Launch the application using build 20020508 with the latest UI code
2. Create a new file (e.g. f1.txt)
3. Open multiple files in different editors
4. From the file menu, select 'Close All Saved'
5. Verify that all open editors, including the newly created file, are closed without any changes being made.
